de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi

Class NBTItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound
      • de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTItem

  • public class NBTItem
extends NBTCompound
    NBT class to access vanilla/custom tags on ItemStacks. This class doesn't autosave to the Itemstack, use getItem to get the changed ItemStack
    Author:
    tr7zw

    • Constructor Detail

      • NBTItem

        public NBTItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Constructor for NBTItems. The ItemStack will be cloned!
        Parameters:
        item -

      • NBTItem

        public NBTItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,
               boolean directApply)
        Constructor for NBTItems. The ItemStack will be cloned! If directApply is true, all changed will be mapped to the original item. Changes to the NBTItem will overwrite changes done to the original item in that case.
        Parameters:
        item -
        directApply -

        setCompound in class NBTCompound

      • applyNBT

        public void applyNBT(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Apply stored NBT tags to the provided ItemStack.

        Note: This will completely override current item's ItemMeta. If you still want to keep the original item's NBT tags, see mergeNBT(ItemStack) and mergeCustomNBT(ItemStack).

        Parameters:
        item - ItemStack that should get the new NBT data

      • mergeNBT

        public void mergeNBT(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Merge all NBT tags to the provided ItemStack.
        Parameters:
        item - ItemStack that should get the new NBT data

      • mergeCustomNBT

        public void mergeCustomNBT(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Merge only custom (non-vanilla) NBT tags to the provided ItemStack.
        Parameters:
        item - ItemStack that should get the new NBT data

      • hasCustomNbtData

        public boolean hasCustomNbtData()
        True, if the item has any tags now known for this item type.
        Returns:
        true when custom tags are present

      • clearCustomNBT

        public void clearCustomNBT()
        Remove all custom (non-vanilla) NBT tags from the NBTItem.

        Returns:
        Does the ItemStack have a NBTCompound.

      • convertItemtoNBT

        public static NBTContainer convertItemtoNBT(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Helper method that converts ItemStack to NBTContainer with all it's data like Material, Damage, Amount and Tags.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:
        ItemStack using the NBTCompound's data
